text: Mortal Kombat is a 2021 movie and a reboot of the Mortal Kombat movie series. It was directed by Simon McQuold and produced by James Wan. ==Cast== *Ludi Lin as Liu Kang *Joe Taslim as Bi-Han / Sub-Zero *Tadanobu Asano as Raiden *Hiroyuki Sanada as Scorpion *Josh Lawson as Kano *Chin Han as Shang Tsung ==Other websites== * Mortal Kombat at the Internet Movie Database Category:2021 action movies Category:2021 fantasy movies Category:Mortal Kombat movies Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Reboot movies Category:2020s American action movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Australian action movies Category:Australian fantasy movies Category:Martial arts movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies set in Indiana Category:Movies set in Japan Category:Movies composed by Benjamin Wallfisch
title: Mortal Kombat (2021 movie)
